title: Inventory tracker
body: A full-stack product tracking solution for a company I worked for. Designed as a React webapp with a REST API backend using Express and Postgres. Styled using MaterialUI.

title: Transmitter
body: An instant messenger. User and guest accounts, private chatrooms, and more. Uses Socket.IO for websockets. React, Redux, Tailwindcss, Express.

title: This website
body: made on NextJS, with Typescript and SCSS.

title: wasm-mandelbrot
body: A Mandelbrot fractal generator that runs on your browser. Using rust+wasm.

title: pizza-stack
body: Website for a fictional store. Made on NextJS with Redux for state management and Magic Auth for authentication.

title: Qt Music Player
body: Desktop music player written in C++/Qt/SQLite. Stores yours music library metadata (artists, albums, album art, etc.), album art view, drag and drop playlists.

title: cdecl
body: C declaration parser that runs on the terminal

title: C++ treeset
body: Binary tree library using smart pointers
